title: Simplify Both Sides
text: We want to start by simplifying both sides and comparing the simplified value. Since the left hand side is already simplified, all we need to do is to evaluate the right hand side.
speech: We want to start by simplifying both sides and comparing the simplified value. Since the left hand side is already simplified, all we need to do is to evaluate the right hand side.

title: Right Hand Side

subHints.title: Right Hand Side
subHints.text: We know that $$|-9|=distance$$ from $$-9$$ to $$0=9$$, so the opposite of $$|-9|$$ is $$-9$$.

speech: What does  minus, the absolute value of negative 9, end absolute value  evaluate to?
pacedSpeech: What does   minus, the absolute value of negative 9, end absolute value

title: Comparing Numbers
text: Now we are left to compare $$-9$$ and $$-9$$, and we know $$-9=-9$$.
speech: Now we are left to compare  minus, 9  and , negative 9 , and we know  negative 9 is equal to negative 9 .

, and we know   negative 9 is equal to negative 9
